en.headline:
INTRODUCING THE CLINCHER COLLECTION.

BABSOCKS. 110% COTTON.
en.copy2: You've had the team's back all season, and now it's our turn to have yours.
en.copy3: The boys are gonna need all the support they can get against Washington, so rep the Buds in every barn with our Home and Away pack, and we'll throw in a free pair of limited edition "Playoffs" Babsocks!
